title: FPS issues
body: Hey everybody, so when I uncap my fps i get some intense stuttering. (300+) Does anybody else have this problem? Any solutions?

replies.body: OK ill try it out thanks for the response!

Some higher end machines can suffer from screen tearing when their frames are uncapped, so in your case, it just might be best to leave them capped out at a certain point. You might also try re-enabling v-sync and testing that in a practice game to see what works best! 

If you decide you'd like some help with adjusting those settings to find what's best, feel free to hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
